Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: Every four weeks when I went to see a friend who is living in the area we went for lunch at Brasserie 't Siertje. Very nice place. Super friendly staff. Beautiful food. One of my favourites: Uitsmijter Rosbief or Uitsmijter Ham Kaas. Good coffee. And nice dessert. Fantastic Dame Blanche. Warmly recommended.

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: They are nice until you Get a bad service and say something about it. Then you will meet a very rude and not polite staff. We were shocked about the fact that we received an burnt pancake and when we asked politely for another one, a war â€¦

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: Excellent service, friendly and welcoming and accommodating. Excited for breakfast tomorrow!

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: Old school place with lots of locals.  The people working there (which are also the owners) are very kind. Don't go here expecting hip dishes and local expensive coffee beans. Very hard working people and a fun place if you want to try out a typical old fashioned dutch lunch.

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: Good option for lunching or grabbing a bite to eat. The menu is quite extensive, including a variety of warm meals in addition to the more typical broodjes and omelettes. In the summer it is nice to seat outside.

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: The guy in the service was literally the nicest ever! He was super helpful and friendly! That alone is worth 5 stars! â€¦

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: I am a 24-year old polite, professional woman, and I have never had a problem like this before: Upon arrival at this establishment I asked the man working (who seemed to be the owner or manager) if it was alright if I read for a while while â€¦

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: A lovely family-owned restaurant with a no-nonsense menu and one of the only terraces in the neighborhood with afternoon sun.

Name: Brasserie 't Siertje
Review Text: Nice, friendly staff and delicious food. My only complaint is that it's so hard to find.
